name: Floppy bird (PKerfant)
description:
Play as a pixelated bird and fly between obstacles to increase your score. Try to reach the highest score ! Heavily inspired by the game: Flappy Bird.

Features:

  • Endlessly placed pipes, with random elevations, that you have to avoid.
  • Choose from 5 distinct birds to play (they're only reskins, no new abilities or whatever) !

Controls :

  • Spacebar to jump/fly

Credits:

  • Programming and art assets by me
  • Sounds and music from Freesound.org (see relevant credit section in game)
  • Made with Unity

The game was made within a day in late 2021.
